text: Régine Zylberberg (born Regina Zylberberg; 26 December 1929 – 1 May 2022),Biography in Context (2011) Gale, Detroit often known mononymously as Régine, was a Belgian-born French singer and nightclub impresario. She was known as the "Queen of the Night". She was born in Anderlecht, Belgium. Zylberberg died on 1 May 2022 in Paris, France at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Belgian singers Category:Singers from Paris Category:People from Anderlecht
title: Régine Zylberberg
